1. How TikTok’s Parent, ByteDance, Became an A.I. Powerhouse  The New York Times
  2. Now it’s TikTok parent ByteDance’s turn for a reasoning AI: enter Seed-Thinking-v1.5!  VentureBeat
  3. From viral videos to AI giant: How ByteDance built a tech empire  The Economic Times
  4. How TikTok’s parent, ByteDance, became an AI powerhouse  The Straits Times
